column6: "ORIGINS AND ENDINGS" Part 3 (of 5)  The entire Marvel Universe holds its collective breathâ€"after all this time, can it be true?  Wolverine returns to his "birthplace," the top-secret military installation known as Department H, the site of the original Weapon X project.  But what is he looking for...and who is looking for him?
